text: HBO Max’s new TV and movie release schedule for July 28 to August 3, 2025, includes Worst Cooks in America Season 29, Kung Fu Panda 2, and The Nun (2018). On July 29, Worst Cooks in America Season 29 drops on the streaming platform. The reality show sees chefs mentoring teams consisting of amateur cooks. They receive training from the chefs to improve their skills and avoid elimination at every round. Further, the animated comedy film Kung Fu Panda 2 will be available on HBO Max this week. It focuses on Dragon Warrior Po’s battle against Peacock Shen, who wishes to destroy Kung Fu and rule China. Also coming to HBO Max on August 1 is The Nun (2018). The horror thriller follows a priest and a novice visiting a Romanian church after a nun there passes away under mysterious circumstances. However, things turn upside down with the presence of an evil supernatural force haunting the place. html:
HBO Max’s new TV and movie release schedule for July 28 to August 3, 2025, includes Worst Cooks in America Season 29, Kung Fu Panda 2, and The Nun (2018).

On July 29, Worst Cooks in America Season 29 drops on the streaming platform. The reality show sees chefs mentoring teams consisting of amateur cooks. They receive training from the chefs to improve their skills and avoid elimination at every round.

Further, the animated comedy film Kung Fu Panda 2 will be available on HBO Max this week. It focuses on Dragon Warrior Po’s battle against Peacock Shen, who wishes to destroy Kung Fu and rule China.

Also coming to HBO Max on August 1 is The Nun (2018). The horror thriller follows a priest and a novice visiting a Romanian church after a nun there passes away under mysterious circumstances. However, things turn upside down with the presence of an evil supernatural force haunting the place.

New HBO Max releases for July 28-August 3, 2025

Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to HBO Max from July 28 to August 3, 2025

Tuesday, July 29

  • Worst Cooks in America, Season 29 (FOOD Network)

Thursday, July 31

  • Don’t Hate Your House with the Property Brothers, Season 2 (HGTV)

Friday, August 1

  • Alien: Covenant
  • Barbershop (2002)
  • Barbershop 2: Back in Business
